archer.name: 步弓手
archer.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against armored targets
- Countered by Horsemen

baghlah.name: 巴格拉战船
baghlah.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

battering-ram.name: 攻城锤
battering-ram.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed

camel-archer.name: 骆驼射手
camel-archer.description:
Highly mobile and durable ranged unit.
+Bonus damage vs Spearmen
-High cost

camel-rider.name: 骆驼骑兵
camel-rider.description:
Highly mobile and durable melee unit effective against all cavalry.
+Bonus damage to cavalry
+Causes enemy cavalry to deal less damage
-High cost

counterweight-trebuchet.name: 配重式巨型投石机
counterweight-trebuchet.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units

crossbowman.name: 弩手
crossbowman.description:
High damage ranged unit best against armored targets.
+ Anti-armor specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen

culverin.name: 长管炮
culverin.description:
Long-range mobile cannon with bonus vs buildings.
+ Effective against Defenses
+ Does not require setup to fire

dhow.name: 阿拉伯帆船
dhow.description:
Light war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability and speed.
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

explosive-dhow.name: 爆破型阿拉伯帆船
explosive-dhow.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction

fishing-boat.name: 渔船
fishing-boat.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat

ghulam.name: 古拉姆
ghulam.description:
Tough infantry that deal two attacks in rapid succession.
+ High armor
+ Higher attack damage on charge
- Lower base attack damage than a Man-at-Arms
- Slow movement
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

handcannoneer.name: 火枪兵
handcannoneer.description:
Powerful all-purpose ranged infantry.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen

horseman.name: 骑手
horseman.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen

imam.name: 伊玛目
imam.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Heals friendly units
- Slow movement speed

lancer.name: 长矛骑兵
lancer.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and melee armor. Effective against melee units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

mangonel.name: 轻型投石车
mangonel.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.
+ Effective against massed units
- Must be set up to fire

scout.name: 侦察兵
scout.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
+ High movement speed
- Very weak in combat

spearman.name: 长矛兵
spearman.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
- Weak against armored infantry
- Countered by Archers

springald.name: 扭力弩炮
springald.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.
+ Does not require setup to fire
+ Bonus damage vs. melee infantry
- Trivial damage vs. buildings

trade-ship.name: 商船
trade-ship.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat

trader.name: 商人
trader.description: Traders generate Gold when assigned to trade with a Trade Post or another player’s Market. The distance between the trade target and Market determines the amount of Gold. Once assigned to trade, the Trader makes repeated trips between its Home Market and the trade target. You can assign a new Home Market if you wish to.

transport-ship.name: 运输船
transport-ship.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison
- No combat

villager.name: 村民
villager.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat

xebec.name: 三桅帆船
xebec.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with broadside cannons.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Low movement speed

atabeg.name: 阿塔贝格
atabeg.description: Can be garrisoned into any military production building to grant +20% health to newly trained units.

bedouin-skirmisher.name: 贝都因掷矛手
bedouin-skirmisher.description:
Ranged infantry wielding a javelin to fend off lightly armored enemies.
+ Bonus against light infantry
+ Long Range
- Weak against cavalry

Requires the Trade Wing - Bazaar

bedouin-swordsman.name: 贝都因剑士
bedouin-swordsman.description:
Master Swordsman who excels in melee combat
+ Bonus vs Melee units
- Weak to ranged units

Requires the Trade Wing - Bazaar

camel-lancer.name: 骆驼长矛骑兵
camel-lancer.description:
Higher mobility Lancer with a more powerful charge, but less powerful melee attack. Effective against most units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

dervish.name: 德尔维希
dervish.description:
Mounted Religious unit. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Uses a powerful Mass Heal ability to heal friendly units in an area.
+ Gains increased Healing when carrying a relic.
+ High speed.

desert-raider.name: 沙漠掠夺者
desert-raider.description:
Versatile Cavalry unit that can swap between ranged and melee attacks with a toggle.
+ Effective against Light Infantry in Ranged Mode
+ Effective against Cavalry in Melee Mode
- High cost
- Weak to Ranged units

manjaniq.name: 投石机
manjaniq.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.
+ Effective against massed units
+ Can use Incendiary projectiles for devastating area damage
 - Must be set up to fire

tower-of-the-sultan.name: 苏丹之塔
tower-of-the-sultan.description:
Massive infantry transport effective against buildings and walls. Move speed increases for each unit garrisoned inside.
+ Fires arrows
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Slow move speed when empty

arbaletrier.name: 弓弩手
arbaletrier.description:
High damage ranged unit with a defensive pavise shield. Best used when supported by others.
+ Anti-armor specialist
+ Comes with melee armor
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen

bombard.name: 手推炮
bombard.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ High damage
- Must be set up to fire

carrack.name: 大帆船
carrack.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with broadside cannons.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Low movement speed

cataphract.name: 甲胄骑兵
cataphract.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and a powerful Trample ability that charges through enemies.
+ Heavy armor
+ Trample deals area damage
- No base charge attack
- Slower move speed
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

cheirosiphon.name: 基耶罗喷火筒
cheirosiphon.description:
Durable infantry transport equipped with Greek Fire, effective against Buildings and Walls.
+ Greek Fire persists on ground
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Only attacks buildings
- Slow move speed

demolition-ship.name: 爆破船
demolition-ship.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction

dromon.name: 德罗蒙战舰
dromon.description:
Military ship equipped a flamethrower that can be upgraded to use Greek Fire.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Low weapon range
- Countered by Demolition Ships

galley.name: 箭船
galley.description:
Oared war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

grenadier.name: 掷弹兵
grenadier.description:
Advanced ranged infantry with thrown explosive canisters that deal damage in a small area.
+ Deals area damage
- Low single target damage
- Slow movement speed

horse-archer.name: 骑射手
horse-archer.description:
Highly mobile ranged cavalry effective against slower melee units.
+ High mobility
- Weak vs ranged units

Mercenary that can be purchased per 3 units for a total of 360 Olive Oil.

This Mercenary can only be purchased on Mercenary Houses built near a neutral Trade Post that list this unit. The chance of this unit being available on a Trade Post is 20%.

huihui-pao.name: 回回炮
huihui-pao.description:
Massive siege engine with incredible range, extra effective at destroying buildings and walls.
+ Extremely long range
- Must be set up to fire

Mercenary that can be purchased for 1000 Olive Oil.

javelin-thrower.name: 掷枪兵
javelin-thrower.description:
Ranged infantry effective against other ranged units.
+ Anti-ranged specialist
+ Increased weapon range
+ Comes with ranged armor
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen

keshik.name: 怯薛骑兵
keshik.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and a powerful charge attack. Effective against most units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
+ Restores health after every attack
- Less health than Lancers
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

Mercenary that can be purchased per 2 units for a total of 400 Olive Oil.

Requires the Eastern Mercenary Contract.

landsknecht.name: 国土佣仆
landsknecht.description:
Brave unarmored infantry with an enormous two-handed sword, effective in mixed armies.
+ Melee attack deals area damage
- Low health
- Countered by Archers

Mercenary that can be purchased per 3 units for a total of 480 Olive Oil.

Requires the Western Mercenary Contract.

limitanei.name: 边防军
limitanei.description:
Infantry best used against cavalry. Can enter Shield Wall to take reduced ranged damage.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Increased health
- Shield Wall reduces move speed
- Weak vs armored infantry
- Countered by Archers

longbowman.name: 长弓兵
longbowman.description:
Cheap long-ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ Long range
+ Can construct Palings to fend off cavalry charges
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen

Mercenary that can be purchased per 5 units for a total of 450 Olive Oil.

Requires the Western Mercenary Contract.

mangudai.name: 蒙古突骑
mangudai.description:
Confounding mobile ranged cavalry that can fire while moving.
+ High rate of fire
- Low weapon range

Mercenary that can be purchased per 3 units for a total of 480 Olive Oil.

This Mercenary can only be purchased on Mercenary Houses built near a neutral Trade Post that list this unit. The chance of this unit being available on a Trade Post is 20%.

monk.name: 僧侣
monk.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites starting in the Castle Age (III).
+ Heals friendly units
- Slow movement speed

musofadi-warrior.name: 穆索法迪战士
musofadi-warrior.description:
Infantry effective at ambush attacks and countering heavy armored targets.
+ Can enter stealth
+ Anti-armor specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Archers
- Capital Town Centers, Outposts, and Scouts can spot stealth

Mercenary that can be purchased per 5 units for a total of 400 Olive Oil.

This Mercenary can only be purchased on Mercenary Houses built near a neutral Trade Post that list this unit. The chance of this unit being available on a Trade Post is 20%.

nest-of-bees.name: 一窝蜂
nest-of-bees.description:
Innovative field weapon capable of firing a barrage of rockets to damage defensive positions and clumped enemy troops.
+ Good area of effect damage against most targets
- Slowest movement speed
- Weak if surrounded

royal-cannon.name: 皇家加农炮
royal-cannon.description:
Most powerful siege cannon. Excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ Bonus damage to buildings

royal-knight.name: 皇家骑士
royal-knight.description:
Gain bonus damage for 5 seconds after charging. Effective against most units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

siege-tower.name: 攻城塔
siege-tower.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.
+ High ranged armor
- Cannot attack
- Slow movement speed

sipahi.name: 西帕希骑兵
sipahi.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units. Can gain attack speed at the cost of melee defense.
+ High movement speed
+ Strong against ranged units
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen

Mercenary that can be purchased per 3 units for a total of 480 Olive Oil.

This Mercenary can only be purchased on Mercenary Houses built near a neutral Trade Post that list this unit. The chance of this unit being available on a Trade Post is 20%.

streltsy.name: 射击军
streltsy.description:
Most powerful ranged infantry with reasonable melee capabilities. Increased attack speed while stationary.
+ High damage
+ Lower cost than Handcannoneer
- Slow movement speed

Mercenary that can be purchased per 3 units for a total of 720 Olive Oil.

Requires the Western Mercenary Contract.

tower-elephant.name: 箭塔象
tower-elephant.description:
Powerful ranged cavalry that can fire while moving.
+ High health
+ Mounted with powerful Archers
+ Capable of attacking Stone Walls
- Slow movement speed

Mercenary that can be purchased for 1000 Olive Oil.

Requires the Eastern Mercenary Contract.

varangian-guard.name: 瓦兰吉卫队
varangian-guard.description:
Tough infantry with good damage. Can use Berserking to increase damage for reduced armor.
+ Heavy armor
+ Increases armor of Transports
+ Increased armor near allied Wonders
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Crossbowmen

war-elephant.name: 战象
war-elephant.description:
Heavy cavalry effective against cavalry, siege engines, walls, and buildings.
+ High health and armor
+ Mounted with an advanced Spearman
+ Capable of attacking Stone Walls
- Slow movement speed

Mercenary that can be purchased for 750 Olive Oil.

This Mercenary can only be purchased on Mercenary Houses built near a neutral Trade Post that list this unit. The chance of this unit being available on a Trade Post is 20%.

zhuge-nu.name: 诸葛弩手
zhuge-nu.description:
Fires bolts with a ferocious damage potential against enemy units.
+ High rate of fire
- Ineffective vs armored targets
- Countered by Horsemen

baochuan.name: 宝船

Large sailed war vessel armed with broadside cannons.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Low movement speed

clocktower-bombard.name: 钟楼手推炮

Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.

clocktower-counterweight-trebuchet.name: 钟楼配重式巨型投石机

Innovative field weapon capable of firing a barrage of rockets to damage defensive positions and clumped enemy troops.
+ Good area of effect damage against most targets
- Slowest movement speed
- Weak if surrounded

clocktower-springald.name: 钟楼扭力弩炮
clocktower-springald.description:
Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.

explosive-junk.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction

fire-lancer.name: 火长矛骑兵
fire-lancer.description:
Cavalry wielding explosive-tipped lances.
+ Charge deals area damage
+ Effective at raiding buildings and siege engines
+ Good ranged armor
- Weak in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen

imperial-official.description:
Economic support unit with no combat capability. Automatically gathers Tax (Gold) from buildings.
+ Can supervise buildings to improve their efficiency
- Only a certain number of Officials can exist at a time

junk.name: 戎克船
junk.description:
Oared war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

palace-guard.name: 皇宫卫兵
palace-guard.description:
Tough infantry with good damage. Move faster than Men-At-Arms, but with reduced armor.
+ Armored
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen.

war-junk.name: 戎克战船
war-junk.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships

ghazi-raider.name: 加齐掠夺者
ghazi-raider.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units.
+ High movement speed
+ Increased effectiveness against armored units

man-at-arms.name: 武士
man-at-arms.description:
Tough infantry with good damage.
+ High armor
- Slow movement
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

scholar.name: 学者
scholar.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can be garrisoned in a Mosque or Madrasa to research technology more quickly. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites starting in the Castle Age (III).
+ Heals friendly units
- Low health

sultans-elite-tower-elephant.name: 苏丹的精锐塔象
sultans-elite-tower-elephant.description:
Powerful ranged cavalry that can fire while moving.
+ High health
+ Mounted with Handcannoneers
+ Capable of attacking Stone Walls
- Slow movement speed

hulk.name: 趸船
hulk.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

king.name: 国王
king.description:
A mighty King, a powerful heavy cavalry unit. Heals nearby out of combat units by 2 health every 1 seconds.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

knight.name: 骑士
knight.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and melee armor. Effective against melee units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

ribauldequin.name: 风琴炮
ribauldequin.description:
Five-barreled gunpowder weapon effective against massed units. Deals little damage to buildings.
+ Can hit multiple targets in a single volley
- Short range
- Low ranged armor

wynguard-army.name: 温嘉德军队
wynguard-army.description: Produces an army including two Spearmen, two Crossbowmen, and a Trebuchet.

wynguard-footman.name: 温嘉德步兵
wynguard-footman.description:
Specialized man at arms with high health and pierce armor.
- Slow movement
- Countered by Crossbowmen

wynguard-footmen.name: 温嘉德步兵
wynguard-footmen.description: Produces an army of 6 Wynguard Footmen.

wynguard-raiders.name: 温嘉德掠夺者
wynguard-raiders.description: Produces an army of 3 Horsemen and 3 Knights.

wynguard-ranger.name: 温嘉德长弓兵
wynguard-ranger.description:
Master longbowmen with increased range and damage, good vs. unarmored targets.
+ Long range
+ Can construct Palings to fend off cavalry charges
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen

wynguard-rangers.name: 温嘉德长弓兵
wynguard-rangers.description: Produces an army of 6 Wynguard Rangers.

+ Bonus damage to buildings

Large oared vessel with a powerful forward mounted bombard.

+ Anti-structure specialist

Long-range mobile cannon with bonus vs buildings.
+ Effective against Defenses
+ Does not require setup to fire

royal-ribauldequin.description:
Five-barreled gunpowder weapon effective against massed units. Deals little damage to buildings.
+ Can hit multiple targets in a single volley
- Short range
- Low ranged armor

war-cog.name: 柯克战船
war-cog.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

prelate.name: 高级教士
prelate.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Automatically inspires Villagers to greatly improve their gather rate. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites starting in the Castle Age (III).

- Low health

atakebune.name: 安宅船
atakebune.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with rockets.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Vulnerable vs. Incendiary Ships
- Low movement speed

buddhist-monk.description:
Support unit with the ability to decrease enemy attack damage. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Reduced cost
+ Conversion enhances friendly unit damage
+ Automatically reduces enemy attack damage
+ Heals units

handcannon-ashigaru.description:
Powerful all-purpose ranged infantry.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen

katana-bannerman.description:
Samurai with an aura that increases damage of melee infantry. Comes with the Deflective Armor ability that periodically blocks attacks.
+ Banner drops on death
+ Heavy armor
+ Increased move speed
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

mounted-samurai.name: 骑马武士
mounted-samurai.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and a powerful charge attack. Comes with the Deflective Armor ability that periodically blocks attacks.
+ Heavy armor
+ Deflective Armor recharges out of combat
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

onna-bugeisha.name: 女武艺者
onna-bugeisha.description:
Light melee infantry with fast attack speed and long weapon range.
+ Fast attack speed
+ Fast move speed
+ Long weapon range
- Weak against armored targets
- Countered by Archers, Knights

onna-musha.name: 女武者
onna-musha.description:
Highly mobile ranged cavalry effective against heavy units.
+ Fast move speed
+ Long weapon range
+ Bonus damage vs. heavy units
- Weak vs ranged units

ozutsu.name: 大筒兵
ozutsu.description:
Ranged infantry equipped with a huge gunpowder weapon that has good weapon range, siege, and splash damage.
+ Anti-building
+ Area damage
- Slow move speed
- Slow attack speed
- Countered by Horsemen and Crossbowmen

samurai.name: 日本武士
samurai.description:
Heavy infantry with good damage and defense. Comes with the Deflective Armor ability that periodically blocks attacks.
+ Heavy armor
+ Deflective Armor recharges out of combat
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

shinobi.name: 忍者

Melee infantry that specializes in scouting, sabotage, and assassination.
+ Disguise as enemy Villagers
+ Bonus damage vs. melee
+ Health regeneration
- Capital Town Centers, Outposts, and Scouts can spot disguises

Heals passively.

Support unit with unique privileges to hold and deposit Yorishiro into buildings. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.

Elite siege cavalry leader with high damage. Exceptionally effective vs buildings. If Jeanne is defeated, she will reappear at a Town Center. 
+ Heavy armor
+ Good damage vs buildings

jeanne-darc-hunter.description:
Strong ranged infantry with good damage vs unarmored targets, and bonus damage vs spearmen. If Jeanne is defeated, she can be brought back at a Town Center.
+ High rate of fire
- Countered by Horsemen

jeanne-darc-knight.name: 圣女贞德 - 骑士
jeanne-darc-knight.description:
Powerful heavy cavalry leader with high damage and health. If Jeanne is defeated, she can be brought back at a Town Center.
+ Heavy armor
+ Fast movement
- Countered by Spearmen

jeanne-darc-markswoman.name: 圣女贞德 - 神射手
jeanne-darc-markswoman.description:
Elite heavy siege cavalry leader with high damage. Exceptionally effective vs buildings. If Jeanne is defeated, she will reappear at a Town Center.
+ Heavy armor 
+ Long range 
+ Good damage vs buildings
- Countered only by superior buildings

jeanne-darc-mounted-archer.name: 圣女贞德 - 骑射手
jeanne-darc-mounted-archer.description:
A powerful cavalry archer with exceptional range and damage. If Jeanne is defeated, she can be brought back at a Town Center.
+ Long range
+ Good damage
- Countered by Horsemen

jeanne-darc-peasant.name: 圣女贞德 - 农民
jeanne-darc-peasant.description:
Jeanne gathers resources and constructs buildings as a Villager. She constructs buildings more quickly, and generates more XP while constructing buildings compared to other tasks. If Jeanne is defeated, she can be brought back at a Town Center. 
 - Weak in combat

jeanne-darc-woman-at-arms.name: 圣女贞德 - 披甲女战士
jeanne-darc-woman-at-arms.description:
Strong heavy infantry leader with good armor and health. If Jeanne is defeated, she can be brought back at a Town Center.
+ Heavy armor
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

jeannes-champion.name: 贞德的冠军剑士
jeannes-champion.description:
Tough infantry that excels at countering Spearmen.
+ High armor
+ Bonus damage against Spearmen
- Slow move speed
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

Upgrades to Elite when Jeanne reaches level 4.

jeannes-rider.name: 贞德的骑兵
jeannes-rider.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering Crossbowmen.
+ High movement speed
+ Bonus damage against Crossbowmen
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen

Upgrades to Elite when Jeanne reaches level 4.

donso.name: 当佐兵
donso.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units. Periodically throws a javelin when attacking from ranged.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
+ Comes with melee armor
- Weak against armored infantry
- Countered by Archers and Longbowmen

freeborn-warrior.name: 自由民战士
freeborn-warrior.description:
Fast melee unit with high ranged armour and bonus against ranged.
+ Strong against ranged units
-weak against armoured melee units

hunting-canoe.name: 狩猎独木舟
hunting-canoe.description:
Light war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability and speed.
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

mansa-javelineer.name: 曼萨掷枪兵
mansa-javelineer.description:
Ranged infantry effective against other ranged units. Moves faster and deals poison damage.
+ Anti-ranged specialist
+ Increased weapon range
+ Comes with ranged armor
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen

mansa-musofadi-warrior.name: 曼萨穆索法迪战士
mansa-musofadi-warrior.description:
Infantry effective at ambush attacks and countering heavy armored targets. Has additional melee armour and health.
+ Can enter stealth
+ Anti-armor specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Archers
- Capital Town Centers, Outposts, and Scouts can spot stealth

musofadi-gunner.name: 穆索法迪火枪兵
musofadi-gunner.description:
Powerful ranged infantry effective at ambush attacks.
+ Increased movement speed
+ Can enter stealth
+ High damage
- High cost

sofa.name: 索法骑手
sofa.description:
Cheaper heavy cavalry for reduced health and armor.
+ High movement speed
+ Cheaper cost
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

war-canoe.name: 战争独木舟
war-canoe.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

warrior-scout.name: 战士侦察兵
warrior-scout.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Increased health regeneration
+ Increased move speed
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
- Weak in combat

khaganate-horse-archer.name: 汗国精锐骑射手
khaganate-horse-archer.description:
Highly mobile ranged cavalry effective against slower melee units.
+ High mobility
- Weak vs ranged units

Randomly spawns 5 at the time from the Khaganate Palace.

khaganate-knight.name: 汗国精锐骑士
khaganate-knight.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and melee armor. Effective against melee units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

Randomly spawns 3 at the time from the Khaganate Palace.

khaganate-mangudai.name: 汗国精锐突骑
khaganate-mangudai.description:
Confounding mobile ranged cavalry that can fire while moving.
+ High rate of fire
- Low weapon range

Randomly spawns from the Khaganate Palace.

khaganate-nest-of-bees.name: 汗国一窝蜂
khaganate-nest-of-bees.description:
Innovative field weapon capable of firing a barrage of rockets to damage defensive positions and clumped enemy troops.
+ Good area of effect damage against most targets
- Slowest movement speed
- Weak if surrounded

Randomly spawns from the Khaganate Palace.

khaganate-palace-guard.name: 汗国精锐皇宫卫兵
khaganate-palace-guard.description:
Tough infantry with good damage. Move faster than Men-At-Arms, but with reduced armor.
+ Armored
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen.

Randomly spawns 5 at the time from the Khaganate Palace.

khaganate-warrior-monk.name: 汗国僧侣战士
khaganate-warrior-monk.description:
Military-minded support unit that improves combat capabilities of nearby units after it attacks. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Heals friendly units
+ High utility in large armies
- Low damage

Randomly spawns 2 at the time from the Khaganate Palace.

khan.name: 汗
khan.description:
Ranged cavalry leader able to use Signal Arrows to enhance nearby military units. Reappears at a Town Center if killed.
+ Vision and herding of a Scout
+ Automatically improves with each Age
- Only one Khan per Mongol player

khans-hunter.name: 汗的猎人
khans-hunter.description:
Supporting Cavalry Archer that can fire while moving. Has the Khan's Hunter Aura that improves the range of nearby ranged units.
+High Mobility
+Excellent Vision
-Low Health

light-junk.name: 轻型戎克船
light-junk.description:
Light war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability and speed.
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

shaman.name: 萨满
shaman.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Heals friendly units
- Slow movement speed

traction-trebuchet.name: 牵引式巨型投石机
traction-trebuchet.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a long distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
+ High mobility
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units

gilded-archer.name: 镀金步弓手
gilded-archer.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against armored targets
- Countered by Horsemen

gilded-crossbowman.name: 镀金弩手
gilded-crossbowman.description:
Crossbowmen with increased range and exceptionally high damage against armored units.
+ Anti-armor specialist
+ Long range
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen

gilded-handcannoneer.name: 镀金火枪兵
gilded-handcannoneer.description:
More powerful all-purpose ranged infantry with increased attack speed.
+ High damage
+ Increased attack speed
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen

gilded-horseman.name: 镀金骑手
gilded-horseman.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen

gilded-knight.name: 镀金骑士
gilded-knight.description:
Expensive cavalry with a powerful charge.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

gilded-landsknecht.name: 镀金国土佣仆
gilded-landsknecht.description:
Brave unarmored infantry with an enormous two-handed sword, effective in mixed armies.
+ Melee attack deals area damage
- Low health
- Countered by Archers

gilded-man-at-arms.name: 镀金武士
gilded-man-at-arms.description:
Tough infantry with good damage.
+ High armor
- Slow movement
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

gilded-spearman.name: 镀金长矛兵
gilded-spearman.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
- Weak against armored infantry
- Countered by Archers

gilded-villager.name: 镀金村民
gilded-villager.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units. Gathers resources 28% quicker and builds and repairs 20% faster than regular Villagers.
- Weak in combat

cavalry-archer.name: 骑射手
cavalry-archer.description:
Highly mobile long ranged cavalry which fires two arrows in quick succession. 
+ High mobility
- Weak vs ranged units

grand-galley.name: 大型桨帆船
grand-galley.description:
Large oared vessel which can be upgraded into a naval Military School.
+ Large hold which can be garrisoned by any unit once upgraded into a Military School
+ Very long range
- Lower damage

great-bombard.name: 重型火炮
great-bombard.description:
Largest cannon that can be fielded. Excellent against buildings or groups of targets.
+ High damage
+ Area damage
+ Long Range
- Must be set up to fire

janissary.name: 苏丹亲兵
janissary.description:
Powerful infantry effective against cavalry and can repair siege engines.
+ High damage
+ Bonus damage against cavalry
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Receives additional damage from Archers.

mehter.name: 奥斯曼军乐队
mehter.description:
War drummer that enhances units in an area, except Villagers and Traders.
+ War drum military enhancements
+ High movement speed
- No weapons

lodya-attack-ship.name: 罗德亚攻击船
lodya-attack-ship.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

lodya-demolition-ship.name: 罗德亚爆破船
lodya-demolition-ship.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
+ The Lodya can be converted to any other type of ship
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction

lodya-fishing-boat.name: 罗德亚渔船
lodya-fishing-boat.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Does not require a Dock to drop off gathered Food and gathers faster than a regular Fishing Boat.
- No combat
The Lodya Fishing Boat can be converted to any other type of ship.

lodya-galley.name: 罗德亚战舰
lodya-galley.description:
Oared war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

lodya-trade-ship.name: 罗德亚商船
lodya-trade-ship.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
The Lodya can be converted to any other type of ship.

lodya-transport-ship.name: 罗德亚运输船
lodya-transport-ship.description:
Can be garrisoned by any unit and uses their sight range. Allows garrisoned units to be transport across water.
The Lodya can be converted to any other type of ship.

militia.name: 民兵
militia.description:
Light melee infantry equipped with a polearm.
+ Fast moving
- Countered by Archers
- Can't garrison
- Loses life over time

warrior-monk.name: 僧侣战士
warrior-monk.description:
Military-minded support unit that improves combat capabilities of nearby units after it attacks. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Heals friendly units
+ High utility in large armies
- Low damage

imperial-guard.name: 帝国卫队
imperial-guard.description:
Expensive cavalry with high damage and melee armor. Effective against melee units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

Requires Dynastic Protectors researched at Zhu Xi's Library.

shaolin-monk.name: 少林僧侣
shaolin-monk.description:
Monk with strong combat capabilities.
+ Strong against ranged units 
+ Can heal themselves
- Cannot heal others

yuan-raider.name: 元朝掠夺者
yuan-raider.description:
Extremely swift light cavalry which deals bonus damage to economic units.
+ Fast move speed
+ Bonus damage vs Villagers
- Weak in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen

Requires Dynastic Protectors researched at Zhu Xi's Library.

abbasid.name: 阿巴斯王朝
abbasid.description: The Abbasid Dynasty pursues a flourishing Golden Age by concentrating structures around their House of Wisdom, allowing them to unlock significant economic advantages. The House of Wisdom also drives progress through the Ages and grants access to advanced technology. Abbasid camel units are expert at countering enemy cavalry.

ayyubids.name: 阿尤布王朝
ayyubids.description: At the confluence of continents, where trade and science meet, and where empires clash, the Ayyubids use their pursuit of knowledge to gain the upper hand. The House of Wisdom is the focal point of this combination of urbanization and science, unlocking powerful Golden Age bonuses and advancing through the ages. The Ayyubids focus on versatile units to gain a tactical advantage on the battlefield.

byzantines.name: 拜占庭帝国
byzantines.description: The Byzantines construct sprawling networks of life-giving Aqueducts and Cisterns. Leverage powerful unique abilities and hire Mercenaries with exquisite Olive Oil. Peasants work tirelessly to manufacture Olive Oil for the empire.

chinese.name: 中国
chinese.description: The Chinese can shift their focus across the ages, deploying many unique units and building rapidly. Enemies must continually adapt if they want to keep up.

delhi.name: 德里苏丹国
delhi.description: The Delhi Sultanate stays many steps ahead of their enemies with great networks of scholars. Fully realized, they field the intimidating War Elephant and trample those in their path.

english.name: 英国
english.description: Exceptional early infantry provide the English with a powerful punch backed up by reliable Food production from the fields.

french.name: 法国
french.description: The French deploy powerful cavalry units and can boost production in fortified positions. Enemies must be prepared to withstand the charges of powerful Royal Knights and other armored units.

hre.name: 神圣罗马帝国
hre.description: Prelates enhance the economy of the Holy Roman Empire, while powerful infantry units form the core of its military. Enemies must face an opponent able to rapidly recover from attacks and field strong counterattacks.

japanese.name: 日本
japanese.description: Ruling over the Japanese land, the Daimyo enhances agriculture and employs Samurai to defend their territory. The unique Forge works tirelessly to sharpen their blades to give an edge in battle. Fierce Samurai Bannermen lead their diverse army of infantry and cavalry to victory.

jeannedarc.name: 贞德
jeannedarc.description: A spark of hope for the French people, Jeanne d'Arc takes to the battlefield and inspires courage to her followers. Starting as a humble villager, Jeanne begins the Journey of a Hero in the Dark Age. Experience forges Jeanne into a powerful leader, gaining access to trusted companions and powerful abilities which shape the empire she was destined to create.

malians.name: 马里
malians.description: The Malian economy booms with options for gold and food production. Claiming gold deposits for their Pit Mines, they leverage that growth to produce unique infantry units that strike from stealth and hurl javelins at enemies.

mongols.name: 蒙古
mongols.description: Masters of mobility and mounted warfare, the Mongols can easily relocate their camps. They gain economic benefits from setting up near Stone Outcroppings and from raiding enemy buildings. Enemies must deal with cavalry attacks from the opening moments of play.

orderofthedragon.name: 龙之骑士团
orderofthedragon.description: The Order of the Dragon is established by handpicked wealthy elites to crush hostile empires. Investing large amounts of resources into training only a few exceptional warriors, the Order succeeds in raising an elite army unlike any other.

ottomans.name: 奥斯曼帝国
ottomans.description: The Ottoman Army can expand to dominate the battlefield, supported by Military Schools that are able to continuously produce units to swell the ranks of their formations. Supporting those formations, the Mehter war drums signal the highly trained troops to take situational advantage.

rus.name: 俄罗斯
rus.description: The Rus derive great benefit from the countryside. They are able to gather resources more readily from hunting and forestry and can field strong combat units. Enemies face strong early game fortifications and a diverse economy that cannot easily be disrupted.

zhuxi.name: 朱熹的遗产
zhuxi.description: The teachings of philosopher Zhu Xi reshape the Chinese civilization. With Zhu Xi’s Legacy, the Chinese boast a sophisticated administration with superior Imperial Officials and advanced technologies. The brimming treasury helps to establish powerful dynasties and research a breadth of unique technologies. Recruit Palace Guards, Zhuge Nus, and Grenadiers early on to protect the Empire.

adjustable-crossbars.name: 可调式横杆
adjustable-crossbars.description: Increases Mangonel range by +1, blast radius by +100%, and adds +1 projectile to attacks.

agriculture.name: 农业
agriculture.description: Improve Villagers' gathering rate from Farms by +15%.

angled-surfaces.name: 斜面
angled-surfaces.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.

armored-caravans.name: 装甲商队
armored-caravans.description: Grant +3 armor to Traders and Trade Ships.

armored-hull.name: 装甲船身
armored-hull.description: Increase the health of all military ships by +20% and ranged armor by +1.

arrowslits.name: 射箭槽
arrowslits.description: Add defensive arrowslits to this structure and increase garrison arrow range by +1. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.

balanced-projectiles.name: 平衡炮弹
balanced-projectiles.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.

biology.name: 生物学
biology.description: Investing in natural sciences increases the health of all cavalry by +30%.

bloomery.name: 熟铁块吹炼法
bloomery.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

boiling-oil.name: 沸油
boiling-oil.description: Towers and Keeps gain a boiling oil attack against nearby units that deals 30 damage.

boot-camp.name: 新兵训练营
boot-camp.description: Increase the health of all infantry by +15%.

camel-handling.name: 骆驼操纵
camel-handling.description: Increase the movement speed of camel units by +15%.

camel-rider-barding.name: 骆驼骑兵皮甲
camel-rider-barding.description: Increase the armor of Camel Riders by +2.

camel-rider-shields.name: 骆驼骑兵护盾
camel-rider-shields.description: Grant Camel Riders shields, improving their melee armor by +3.

camel-support.name: 骆驼支援
camel-support.description: Camels increase the armor of nearby infantry by +2.

cannon-emplacement.name: 加农炮炮台
cannon-emplacement.description: Add a defensive cannon emplacement to this structure.

chemistry.name: 化学
chemistry.description: Advancements in alchemical research increase the bonus damage of all gunpowder siege weapons by +25%.

composite-bows.name: 复合弓
composite-bows.description: Increase the attack speed of Archers by +33%.

court-architects.name: 宫廷建筑师
court-architects.description: Patronage of the finest builders increases all building health by +30%.

crosscut-saw.name: 横切锯
crosscut-saw.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15% and Wood gatherers carry capacity by +5.

culture-wing.name: 文化偏殿
culture-wing.description:
The following cultural technologies become available:
• Preservation of Knowledge (Age II)
• Medical Centers (Age III)
• Public Libraries (Age IV)

cupellation.name: 灰吹法
cupellation.description: Gold gatherers drop off 15% more resources.

damascus-steel.name: 大马士革钢
damascus-steel.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

decarbonization.name: 脱碳
decarbonization.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

double-broadax.name: 双阔斧
double-broadax.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15%.

drift-nets.name: 流刺网
drift-nets.description: Increase the gathering rate of Fishing Ships by +10%, carry capacity by +20 and move speed by +10%.

economic-wing.name: 经济偏殿
economic-wing.description:
Constructs the Economic Wing.
The following economic technologies become available:
• Fertile Crescent (Age II)
• Agriculture (Age III)
• Improved Processing (Age IV)

elite-army-tactics.name: 精锐军队战术
elite-army-tactics.description: Training elite infantry leads to improved prowess in battle. Melee Infantry gain +20% damage and +4 melee armor.

explosives.name: 炸药
explosives.description: Increase the damage of Incendiary Ships by +40%.

extended-lines.name: 延绳钓
extended-lines.description: Increase the gathering rate of Fishing Ships by +15% and carry capacity by +10.

extra-hammocks.name: 额外吊床
extra-hammocks.description: Increases the number of arrows fired by Archer Ships by +1.

fertile-crescent.name: 新月沃土
fertile-crescent.description: Reduce the cost of Economy buildings and Houses by 35%.

fertilization.name: 施肥
fertilization.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.

fitted-leatherwork.name: 合身皮具
fitted-leatherwork.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.

forestry.name: 林业
forestry.description: Double the rate at which Villagers chop down trees.

fortify-outpost.name: 强化哨站
fortify-outpost.description: Add +1000 health and +5 fire armor to this Outpost.

fresh-foodstuffs.name: 新鲜食品
fresh-foodstuffs.description: Reduce the cost to produce Villagers by -35%.

grand-bazaar.name: 大集市
grand-bazaar.description: Traders and Trade Ships also return with a secondary resource. This resource is 25% the base Gold value and is set at the market.

greased-axles.name: 润滑轮轴
greased-axles.description: Increase the movement speed of siege engines by +15%.

heated-shot.name: 加热射击
heated-shot.description: Archer Ship arrows light enemy Ships on fire, dealing damage over time.

herbal-medicine.name: 草药
herbal-medicine.description: Increase the healing rate of religious units by +60%.

horticulture.name: 园艺学
horticulture.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.

incendiary-arrows.name: 燃烧箭
incendiary-arrows.description: Flammable munitions grant non-gunpowder ranged units a siege arrow or bolt when attacking buildings and increase their damage by +20%.

insulated-helm.name: 绝缘头盔
insulated-helm.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.

iron-undermesh.name: 铁制底网
iron-undermesh.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.

lightweight-beams.name: 轻质横梁
lightweight-beams.description: Increase Battering Ram attack speed by +20% and reduce their field construction time by -50%.

lumber-preservation.name: 木材保存
lumber-preservation.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15%.

master-smiths.name: 军事偏殿 : 铁匠大师
master-smiths.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.

medical-centers.name: 医疗中心
medical-centers.description: Town Centers and Keeps heal nearby units for +2 health every 1 second.

military-academy.name: 军事学院
military-academy.description:
Increase the production speed of infantry, cavalry, siege, and transport units at buildings by 33%.
Does not affect religious units or other support units.

military-wing.name: 军事偏殿
military-wing.description:
Constructs the Military Wing. Upon completion, grants 2 Spearmen & 2 Archers (Age II), 2 Camel Riders (Age III), or 3 Handcannoneers (Age IV).
Unlocks:
•Boot Camp (Age II)
•Composite Bows (Age III)
•Camel Support (Age IV)

naval-arrowslits.name: 海军射箭槽
naval-arrowslits.description: Add a defensive arrowslit to this Dock which only attacks ships.

phalanx.name: 方阵
phalanx.description: Increase the attack range of Spearmen by +100%.

piety.name: 虔诚
piety.description: Increase the health of religious units by +40.

platecutter-point.name: 箭头穿孔板甲
platecutter-point.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.

precision-cross-breeding.name: 精准杂交育种
precision-cross-breeding.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.

preservation-of-knowledge.name: 保存知识
preservation-of-knowledge.description: Reduce the cost of all technology and Age advancements by -20%.

professional-scouts.name: 专业侦察兵
professional-scouts.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -35% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar.

proselytization.name: 传教
proselytization.description: Imams can convert units without holding a Relic, but can only target a single unit.

public-libraries.name: 公共图书馆
public-libraries.description: Villagers and Traders gain +2 health per economic upgrade.

roller-shutter-triggers.name: 卷帘式触发器
roller-shutter-triggers.description: Increases Springald attack speed by +25% and grants +10% Ranged Resistance.

serpentine-powder.name: 蛇纹石粉末
serpentine-powder.description: With new gunpowder, Handcannoneers gain +8 damage against melee infantry and gain a brief increase to their movement speed after firing their weapon.

shaft-mining.name: 竖井开采
shaft-mining.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold and Stone by 15%.

shipwrights.name: 造船工
shipwrights.description: Increase the health of all military ships by +20% and ranged armor by +1.

siege-works.name: 攻城武器
siege-works.description: New carpentry techniques increase the health of siege units by +20%.

silk-bowstrings.name: 蚕丝弓弦
silk-bowstrings.description: Stringing bows with silk grants Archers +2 range and Mounted Archers +1 range.

specialized-pick.name: 特制矿锄
specialized-pick.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold and Stone by 15%.

spice-roads.name: 香料之路
spice-roads.description: Increase the Gold income from Traders and Trade Ships by +30%.

springald-crews.name: 扭力弩炮队
springald-crews.description: Springald Ships gain +1 range and attack 20% faster.

springald-emplacement.name: 扭力弩炮炮台
springald-emplacement.description: Add a defensive springald emplacement to this structure.

spyglass.name: 小型望远镜
spyglass.description: Increase the sight radius of Scouts by 30%.

steeled-arrow.name: 钢制箭头
steeled-arrow.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.

survival-techniques.name: 生存技术
survival-techniques.description: Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +15%.

swivel-cannon.name: 旋转加农炮
swivel-cannon.description: Springald Ships gain an additional Cannon which fires in 360 degrees.

teak-masts.name: 柚木桅杆
teak-masts.description: Increase the health of military ships by +10%.

tithe-barns.name: 什一税仓库
tithe-barns.description: Relics placed in a Monastery provide an income of +40 Food, +40 Wood, and +10 Stone every minute.

trade-wing.name: 贸易偏殿
trade-wing.description:
Constructs the Trade Wing. Acts as a home market and grants 3, 4, or 5 Traders upon completion (based on Age).
Unlocks:
•Armored Caravans (Age II)
•Grand Bazaar (Age III)
•Spice Roads (Age IV)

wedge-rivets.name: 楔形铆钉
wedge-rivets.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.

wheelbarrow.name: 独轮推车
wheelbarrow.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +5 and their movement speed by +15%.

bonus-culture-wing-advancement.name: 文化偏殿: 升级
bonus-culture-wing-advancement.description:
Constructs the Culture Wing.
Build this wing to advance to the next Age in 20% less time and with 1300 less costs.

bonus-culture-wing-logistics.name: 文化偏殿: 后勤学
bonus-culture-wing-logistics.description:
Constructs the Culture Wing.
Upon completion, grants 4 Dervish, improves the unit's healing by +50%, and turns it on permanently.

bonus-economic-wing-growth.name: 经济偏殿: 发展
bonus-economic-wing-growth.description:
Constructs the Economic Wing.
Upon completion, grants 10 Villagers and all Villagers work +10% faster.

bonus-economic-wing-industry.name: 经济偏殿: 工业
bonus-economic-wing-industry.description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
The Blacksmith's damage and armor technologies become free and complete automatically when entering an Age. (Those of other Ages must still be researched as normal).

bonus-military-wing-master-smiths.name: 军事偏殿: 铁匠大师
bonus-military-wing-master-smiths.description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
The Blacksmith's damage and armor technologies become free and complete automatically when entering an Age. (Those of other Ages must still be researched as normal).

bonus-military-wing-reinforcement.description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
Upon completion, Cavalry units gain the ability to construct siege weapons.
The House of Wisdom produces 7 Desert Raiders immediately and then every 2 minutes for the rest of the game.

bonus-trade-wing-advisors.name: 商业偏殿: 顾问
bonus-trade-wing-advisors.description:
Constructs the Trade Wing.
Upon completion, gain 7 Atabeg which can be garrisoned in any military production building (except Docks) to increase the health of newly trained units by 20%.

bonus-trade-wing-bazaar.name: 商业偏殿: 集市
bonus-trade-wing-bazaar.description:
Constructs the Trade Wing.
Every three minutes a trade caravan arrives with a random selection of four favorable exchanges of resources and units.
The quality of these trades is permanently set depending on the Age at which the Trade Wing is constructed. Using the Trade Wing to enter a later age provides more lucrative trades.

infantry-support.name: 步兵支援
infantry-support.description: Infantry increase the armor of nearby camels by 3.

siege-carpentry.name: 木制攻城器械
siege-carpentry.description:
Upon completion, siege units gain access to the Structural Reinforcements ability.
Siege units gain +20 melee armor and +5 fire armor for 10 seconds.

sultans-mamluks.name: 苏丹的马穆鲁克
sultans-mamluks.description: Infantry gains +25% damage and +20% movement speed for 10 seconds after killing a unit.

border-settlements.name: 边境聚落
border-settlements.description: Increase House line of sight by 7 tiles and improve their construction speed by 500%.

eastern-mercenary-contract.name: 东方雇佣兵合同
eastern-mercenary-contract.description:
Unlocks production of Keshik, Ghulam, and Tower Elephant mercenaries.
Keshik: Feudal Age
Ghulam: Veteran contract
Tower Elephant: Elite contract

elite-mercenaries.name: 精锐合同
elite-mercenaries.description: Upgrade Veteran Mercenaries to Elite Mercenaries.

expilatores.name: 掠夺者
expilatores.description: Horseman damage vs. Workers increased by +2. Workers killed by your Horsemen reward +20 Gold.

ferocious-speed.name: 狂暴速度
ferocious-speed.description: Varangian Guard increase their move speed by +30% when activating Berserking.

greek-fire-projectiles.name: 希腊之火炮弹
greek-fire-projectiles.description: Counterweight Trebuchets deal +30% increased damage and engulf their target with Greek Fire, dealing area damage. Greek Fire does not stack with other patches.

heavy-dromon.name: 重型德罗蒙战舰
heavy-dromon.description: Upgrade all Dromons to leave Greek Fire on the surface or ground where they attack. Man The Sails cooldown also reduced to 20 seconds.

liquid-explosives.name: 液体炸药
liquid-explosives.description: Incendiary Ships deal full damage to all enemies in their explosion radius.

mangonel-emplacement.name: 轻型投石车炮台
mangonel-emplacement.description: Add a defensive mangonel emplacement to this structure.

numeri.name: 努梅里
numeri.description: Enemy units hit by Trample become vulnerable and receive +15% increased damage for 12 seconds.

siege-engineering.name: 攻城工程学
siege-engineering.description: Melee and ranged infantry can construct Siege Towers and Battering Rams in the field.

silk-road-mercenary-contract.name: 丝绸之路雇佣兵合同
silk-road-mercenary-contract.description:
Unlocks production of Javelin Thrower, Camel Rider, and Grenadier mercenaries.
Javelin Thrower: Feudal Age
Camel Rider: Veteran contract
Grenadier: Elite contract

teardrop-shields.name: 泪滴盾牌
teardrop-shields.description: Increase the armor of Cataphracts by +1, move speed of Limitanei by +15%, and attack speed of Varangian Guard by +15%.

trapezites.name: 纵火者
trapezites.description: Scouts enhance the torch damage of nearby units by 25%

veteran-mercenaries.name: 老练合同
veteran-mercenaries.description: Upgrade Hardened Mercenaries to Veteran Mercenaries.

western-mercenary-contract.name: 西方雇佣兵合同
western-mercenary-contract.description:
Unlocks production of Longbowman, Landsknecht, and Streltsy mercenaries.
Longbowman: Feudal Age
Landsknecht: Veteran contract
Streltsy: Elite contract

additional-barrels.name: 加装炮管
additional-barrels.description: Nest of Bees receive 2 additional Rocket Arrows.

ancient-techniques.name: 古代技术
ancient-techniques.description: Increase the gathering rate of Villagers by +4% for each dynasty achieved.

battle-hardened.name: 身经百战
battle-hardened.description: Increase the health of Palace Guards by +30.

extra-materials.name: 额外材料
extra-materials.description: Towers and Keeps repair nearby walls and gates for +20 health per second.

handcannon-slits.name: 手铳射箭槽
handcannon-slits.description: Add defensive handcannon slits to this structure and increases garrison arrow range by +1. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.

imperial-examinations.name: 科举制
imperial-examinations.description: Increase the maximum amount of Gold carried by Imperial Officials from +40 to +80.

pyrotechnics.name: 火工技术
pyrotechnics.description: Increase the range of Handcannons by +1.5.

reload-drills.name: 装填训练
reload-drills.description: Increase the attack speed of Bombards by +33%.

thunderclap-bombs.name: 霹雳弹
thunderclap-bombs.description: Warships fire a Nest of Bees attack.

all-seeing-eye.name: 全视之眼
all-seeing-eye.description: Increase the sight range of Scholars by +100%.

armored-beasts.name: 装甲野兽
armored-beasts.description: Grant +25% health and +4 ranged armor to War Elephants.

efficient-production.name: 高效生产
efficient-production.description: Allow Scholars to garrison in military buildings, boosting production speed by 100%.

forced-march.name: 急行军
forced-march.description:
Infantry units gain the Forced March ability.
When activated, infantry move +100% faster for 10 seconds, but breaks when dealing damage.

hearty-rations.name: 丰衣足食
hearty-rations.description: Increase the carrying capacity of Villagers by +10.

honed-blades.name: 珩磨剑刃
honed-blades.description: Men-at-Arms and Lancers equip a Kilij, increasing their damage by +3.

howdahs.name: 象轿兵
howdahs.description: Upgrade Tower Elephants to have Elite Crossbowmen as riders instead of Archers. Tower Elephants gain +30% health and +4 ranged armor.

reinforced-foundations.name: 强化地基
reinforced-foundations.description: Villagers and Infantry can garrison inside Houses for protection. Houses gain garrison arrows and +50% Health.

salvaged-materials.name: 回收材料
salvaged-materials.description: Baghlahs heal 30 health when killing an enemy unit.

sanctity.name: 圣洁
sanctity.description: Allow Scholars to capture Sacred Sites before the Castle Age (III). Sacred Sites generate +25% more Gold.

slow-burning-defenses.name: 缓燃防御
slow-burning-defenses.description: Increase the fire armor of Stone Wall Towers, Keeps, and Outposts by +10.

swiftness.name: 迅捷
swiftness.description: Increases the movement speed of Scholars by +50%.

tranquil-venue.name: 宁静之地
tranquil-venue.description: Mosques restore +4 health every second to units that are out of combat.

village-fortresses.name: 村庄要塞
village-fortresses.description: Keeps act like Town Centers, including unit production, population capacity, and technology.

zeal.name: 狂热
zeal.description: Units healed by Scholars gain +50% attack speed for 3 seconds.

admiralty.name: 海军部
admiralty.description: Increase the range of combat ships by +1.

armor-clad.name: 重装甲
armor-clad.description: Increase the ranged and melee armor of Men-at-Arms by +2.

arrow-volley.name: 万箭齐发
arrow-volley.description: Longbowmen gain Arrow Volley, an activated ability that reduces their time to attack by +1 second for a duration of 6 seconds.

enclosures.name: 圈地
enclosures.description: Each Farm Enclosure being worked by a Villager generates +1 Gold every 5 seconds.

network-of-citadels.name: 城堡网络
network-of-citadels.description: Increase the Network of Castles attack speed bonus from +20% to +40%.

shattering-projectiles.name: 散射炮弹
shattering-projectiles.description: Trebuchet projectiles shatter on impact, increasing their area of effect.

upgrade-king-3.name: 城堡时代之王
upgrade-king-3.description: Increases the health, attack and armor of the King when reaching Castle Age.

upgrade-king-4.name: 帝国时代之王
upgrade-king-4.description: Increases the health, attack and armor of the King when reaching Imperial Age.

cantled-saddles.name: 高鞍尾马鞍
cantled-saddles.description: Increase Royal Knights' bonus damage after a charge from +3 to +10.

chivalry.name: 骑士精神
chivalry.description: Royal Knights regenerate +1 health every 1 seconds when out of combat.

crossbow-stirrups.name: 弩手脚蹬
crossbow-stirrups.description: Increase the attack speed of Arbalétriers by +25%.

enlistment-incentives.name: 募兵奖励
enlistment-incentives.description: Improves the French influence by reducing unit costs by a further -5%.

long-guns.name: 长管大炮
long-guns.description: Increase the damage of naval cannons by +15%.

merchant-guilds.name: 商人公会
merchant-guilds.description: Active Traders generate 1 gold every 6 seconds.

royal-bloodlines.name: 皇室血统
royal-bloodlines.description: Fill the stables with the best stallions, increasing all cavalry health by +40%.

awl-pikes.name: 锥头枪
awl-pikes.description: Increase the damage of Spearmen and Horsemen by +2.

devoutness.name: 虔诚
devoutness.description: Inspired Villagers gather resources +10% faster and construct buildings and defenses +25% quicker.

fire-stations.name: 消防站
fire-stations.description: Military Ships regenerate +1 health every 2 seconds when out of combat.

heavy-maces.name: 重锤
heavy-maces.description: Men-at-Arms wield maces, increasing their bonus damage against heavy targets by +6.

inspired-warriors.name: 战意激昂
inspired-warriors.description: Prelates increase their move speed by 10% and can inspire military units, improving their armor by +1, and damage by +15%.

reinforced-defenses.name: 加强防御
reinforced-defenses.description: Increase the health of walls, towers, and gates by +25%.

steel-barding.name: 钢制马甲
steel-barding.description: Grants Knights +2 melee and +2 ranged armor.

two-handed-weapons.name: 双手武器
two-handed-weapons.description: Men-at-Arms wield two-handed weapons, increasing their damage by +2.

bunrei.name: 分灵
bunrei.description: Increases the maximum number of Yorishiro by +2. Immediately produces 2 Yorishiro at the Floating Gate.

copper-plating.name: 镀铜
copper-plating.description: Improves the fire and ranged armor of ships by +2.

daimyo-manor.name: 大名府邸
daimyo-manor.description:
Increases the production cap of Bannerman Samurai by +1 and provides a free Villager.
Increases Town Center health by +1000, adds an additional arrow slit, and adds an aura which enhances Villagers harvest rate from Farms by +20%.

daimyo-palace.name: 大名宫殿
daimyo-palace.description:
Increases the production cap of Bannerman Samurai by +2 and provides a free Villager.
Increases Town Center health by +2000, fire armor by +2, adds an additional arrow slit, and adds an aura which enhances Villagers harvest rate from Farms by +40%.

do-maru-armor.name: 胴丸护甲
do-maru-armor.description: Increase Mounted Samurai move speed by +10% while Deflective Armor is active.

five-mountain-ministries.name: 五项山地事工
five-mountain-ministries.description: Buddhist Temples cast Sohei Sutra on a nearby enemy every 6 seconds.

fudasashi.name: 札差
fudasashi.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +3, their movement speed by +7%, and +25% gather rate from Berry Bushes.

gion-festival.name: 祗园祭
gion-festival.description: Increases the Line of Sight of all buildings by +2 tiles. Every 3 minutes, all economic units heal for 100% of their health over 3 seconds.

hizukuri.name: 火造
hizukuri.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

kabura-ya-whistling-arrow.name: 鸣镝矢
kabura-ya-whistling-arrow.description: Onna-Musha fire a whistling arrow when an enemy is seen, increasing move speed for 10 seconds.

kobuse-gitae.name: 甲伏锻
kobuse-gitae.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

nagae-yari.name: 日本长枪
nagae-yari.description: Spearmen are equipped with a stronger spear that increases weapon range by +20% and damage against cavalry by +15%.

nehan.name: 涅槃
nehan.description: Upgrades Buddhist Conversion to Nehan Conversion, which has a 25% shorter cooldown and additionally improves nearby allied units movement speed by +25% when cast.

oda-tactics.name: 织田战术
oda-tactics.description: Tactics from powerful daimyo improves melee infantry, increasing their damage by +20%, torch damage by +20%, and melee armor by +4.

odachi.name: 大太刀
odachi.description: Equip Samurai with an Odachi, a long sword that deals +4 bonus damage against infantry.

shinto-rituals.name: 神道教仪式
shinto-rituals.description: Increases Shinto Priest health by +40, healing rate by +60%, and movement speed by +15%.

shogunate-castle.name: 幕府城
shogunate-castle.description:
Increases the production cap of Bannerman Samurai by +3 and provides a free Villager.
Increases Town Center health by +3000, fire armor by +3, adds an aura which enhances Villagers harvest rate from Farms by +60%, and equips a Rocket Emplacement.

takezaiku.name: 竹细工
takezaiku.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +3, their movement speed by +7%, and +25% gather rate from Berry Bushes.

tatara.name: 吹踏鞴制钢法
tatara.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

tawara.name: 塔瓦拉
tawara.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +3, their movement speed by +7%, and +25% gather rate from Berry Bushes.

upgrade-shinobi-3.name: 城堡时代忍者
upgrade-shinobi-3.description: Increases the health and damage of Shinobi when reaching Castle Age.

upgrade-shinobi-4.name: 帝国时代忍者
upgrade-shinobi-4.description: Increases the health and damage of of Shinobi when reaching Imperial Age.

yaki-ire.name: 淬火
yaki-ire.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.

zen.name: 禅宗
zen.description: Buddhist Monks generate 25 gold every 60 seconds.

companion-equipment.name: 同伴装备
companion-equipment.description: Increase Jeanne d'Arc's health and damage by 25% and gain +1 armor. Increase the health and damage of Jeanne's Companions by 20%.

level-2-path-of-the-archer.name: 射手之路
level-2-path-of-the-archer.description:
Level 2 option

Jeanne chooses the path of the Archer, equipping a bow to engage foes from afar.
Gains the Divine Arrow ability, which deals high damage to a single target.

Requires 500XP

level-2-path-of-the-warrior.name: 战士之路
level-2-path-of-the-warrior.description:
Level 2 option

Jeanne chooses the path of the Warrior, equipping a two handed sword to engage foes in close combat.
Gains the Holy Wrath ability, which deals area of effect damage around Jeanne.

Requires 500XP

level-3-champion-companions.name: 冠军剑士同伴
level-3-champion-companions.description:
Level 3 option

Jeanne's Champions become available to train at Keeps.
Gains "To Arms, Men!", which rallies 3 Champions to her side.

Requires 500XP

level-3-rider-companions.name: 骑兵同伴
level-3-rider-companions.description:
Level 3 option

Jeanne's Riders become available to train at Keeps.
Gains "Riders, Ready!", which rallies 3 Riders to her side.

Requires 500XP

level-4-field-commander.name: 战地指挥官
level-4-field-commander.description:
Level 4 option

Jeanne's Rally Call ability will now call 7 of her chosen companions onto the Battlefield.
Gains the Strength of Heaven ultimate ability, which greatly empowers a single unit.

Requires 500XP

level-4-gunpowder-monarch.name: 火药君主
level-4-gunpowder-monarch.description:
Level 4 option

Jeanne's Rally Call ability will now call 3 of her chosen companions and a powerful Cannon onto the Battlefield.
Gains the Valorous Inspiration ultimate ability, which greatly increases the attack speed of nearby allies.

Requires 500XP

ordinance-company.name: 圣令连队
ordinance-company.description: Consecrated buildings also reduce the Wood and Gold cost of units by 25%.

canoe-tactics.name: 独木舟战术
canoe-tactics.description: Archer Ships fire an additional 2 Javelin weapons.

farima-leadership.name: 法里玛领导制
farima-leadership.description: Sofa increase the movement speed of nearby infantry by +15%.

javelin-emplacement.name: 标枪槽
javelin-emplacement.description: Add defensive javelin to this structure and increase garrison arrow range by +1. Javelins deal additional damage to ranged units. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.

local-knowledge.name: 本地知识
local-knowledge.description: Musofadi Warriors and Musofadi Gunners gain +5 healing with each attack for 5 seconds after coming out of stealth.

mounted-guns.name: 舰载炮
mounted-guns.description: Replaces Springald Ship weaponry with Cannons which provide greater range and damage.

poisoned-arrows.name: 毒箭
poisoned-arrows.description: Archer arrows deal an additional 3 damage over 6 seconds.

precision-training.name: 精准训练
precision-training.description: Increase ranged damage of Donso by +6, Archers by +2, and Javelin Throwers by +3.

additional-torches.name: 更多火炬
additional-torches.description: Increase the torch damage of all infantry and cavalry by +3.

additional-torches-improved.name: 更多火炬(已强化)
additional-torches-improved.description:
Increase the torch damage of all infantry and cavalry by +5.
If Additional Torches has already been researched, increase the torch damage from all infantry and cavalry by +2.

biology-improved.name: 生物学(已强化)
biology-improved.description:
Investing in natural sciences increases the health of all cavalry by +40%.
If Biology has already been researched, increase it by +10% instead.

crosscut-saw-improved.name: 横切锯(已强化)
crosscut-saw-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 22.5% and Wood gatherers carry capacity by +5.
If Crosscut Saw has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

cupellation-improved.name: 灰吹法(已强化)
cupellation-improved.description:
Gold gatherers drop off 22.5% more resources.
If Cupellation has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

double-broadax-improved.name: 双阔斧(已强化)
double-broadax-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 22.5%.
If Double Broadax has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

elite-army-tactics-improved.name: 精锐军队战术(已强化)
elite-army-tactics-improved.description:
Training elite infantry leads to improved prowess in battle. Melee Infantry gain +30% damage and +6 melee armor.
If Elite Army Tactics has already been researched, increases damage by +10% and melee armor by +2 instead.

fertilization-improved.name: 施肥(已强化)
fertilization-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 15%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
If Fertilization has already been researched, increase it by 5% instead.

forestry-improved.name: 林业(已强化)
forestry-improved.description: Villagers fell trees in a single chop.

geometry-improved.name: 几何学(已强化)
geometry-improved.description:
Increase damage of Trebuchets by +30%.
If Geometry has already been researched, increase their damage by +10% instead.

greased-axles-improved.name: 润滑轮轴(已强化)
greased-axles-improved.description:
Increase the movement speed of siege engines by +20%.
If Greased Axles has already been researched, increase it by +5% instead.

herbal-medicine-improved.name: 草药(已强化)
herbal-medicine-improved.description:
Increase the healing rate of religious units by +90%.
If Herbal Medicine has already been researched, increase it by +30% instead.

horticulture-improved.name: 园艺学(已强化)
horticulture-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 15%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
If Horticulture has already been researched, increase it by 5% instead.

lightweight-beams-improved.name: 轻质横梁(已强化)
lightweight-beams-improved.description:
Increase Battering Ram attack speed by +30% and reduce their field construction time by -75%.
If Lightweight Beams has already been researched, increase attack speed by +10% and reduce field construction time by -25% instead.

lumber-preservation-improved.name: 木材保存(已强化)
lumber-preservation-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 22.5%.
If Lumber Preservation has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

military-academy-improved.name: 攻城工程学(已强化)
military-academy-improved.description:
Increase the production speed of military and transport units at buildings by 53%.
Does not affect religious or other support units.
If Military Academy has already been researched, increase production speed by 20% instead.

monastic-shrines.name: 僧侣祭坛
monastic-shrines.description: Prayer Tents allow Improved Production within their influence even without an Ovoo.

pax-mongolica.name: 蒙古和平
pax-mongolica.description: Add +300 health and +3 fire armor to all Outposts.

piety-improved.name: 虔诚(已强化)
piety-improved.description:
Increase all Shamans' health by +60.
If Piety has already been researched, increase it by +20 instead.

piracy.name: 海盗行为
piracy.description: Gain +25 Wood and +25 Gold when sinking an enemy ship.

precision-cross-breeding-improved.name: 精准杂交育种(已强化)
precision-cross-breeding-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 15%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
If Precision Cross-Breeding has already been researched, increase it by 5% instead.

professional-scouts-improved.name: 专业侦察兵(已强化)
professional-scouts-improved.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +200% damage against wild animals. Scouts move -35% slower while carrying a carcass and cannot pick up Boar.
If Professional Scouts has already been researched, increase damage by +100% instead.

raid-bounty.name: 突袭赏金
raid-bounty.description: Increase the raid income for igniting a building to +50 Food and Gold.

raid-bounty-improved.name: 突袭赏金(已强化)
raid-bounty-improved.description:
Increase the raid income for igniting a building to +75 Food and Gold.
If Raid Bounty has already been researched, increase the raid income for igniting a building by +25 Food and Gold.

roller-shutter-triggers-improved.name: 卷帘式触发器(已强化)
roller-shutter-triggers-improved.description:
Increases Springald attack speed by +35% and grants +10% Ranged Resistance.
If Roller Shutter Triggers has already been researched, increase by 10% instead.

shaft-mining-improved.name: 竖井开采(已强化)
shaft-mining-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 22.5%.
If Acid Distillation has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

siege-engineering-improved.name: 军事学院(已强化)
siege-engineering-improved.description: Melee and ranged infantry can construct Siege Towers and Battering Rams in the field. Improved Siege Engineering allows for the construction of Mangonels, Springalds and Trebuchets as well.

siege-works-improved.name: 攻城武器(已强化)
siege-works-improved.description:
New carpentry techniques increase the health of siege engines by +30%.
If Siege Works has already been researched, increase their health by +10% instead.

siha-bow-limbs.name: 西哈弓臂
siha-bow-limbs.description: Increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +1.

siha-bow-limbs-improved.name: 西哈弓臂(已强化)
siha-bow-limbs-improved.description:
Increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +2.
If Siha Bow Limbs has already been researched, increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +1.

specialized-pick-improved.name: 特制矿锄(已强化)
specialized-pick-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 22.5%.
If Specialized Pick has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

steppe-lancers.name: 草原长矛骑兵
steppe-lancers.description: Increase Keshik healing by +1 Health per attack and attack speed by +10%.

steppe-lancers-improved.name: 草原长矛骑兵(已强化)
steppe-lancers-improved.description:
Increase Keshik healing by +2 Health per attack and attack speed by +20%.
If Steppe Lancers has already been researched, increase Keshik healing by +1 Health per attack and attack speed by +10%.

stone-bounty.name: 石料赏金
stone-bounty.description: Add +50 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.

stone-bounty-improved.name: 石料商业(已强化)
stone-bounty-improved.description:
Add +75 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.
If Stone Bounty has already been researched, add +25 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.

stone-commerce.name: 石料商业
stone-commerce.description: Traders supply +10% Stone to their trades.

stone-commerce-improved.name: 石料商业(已强化)
stone-commerce-improved.description:
Traders supply +20% Stone to their trades.
If Stone Commerce has already been researched, supply +10% Stone instead.

superior-mobility.name: 卓越机动性
superior-mobility.description: Packed buildings move and pack/unpack 50% faster.

superior-mobility-improved.name: 卓越机动性(已强化)
superior-mobility-improved.description:
Packed buildings move +70% faster and pack/unpack +50% faster.
If Superior Mobility has already been researched, increase speed by +20% instead.

survival-techniques-improved.name: 生存技术(已强化)
survival-techniques-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +20%.
If Survival Techniques has already been researched, increase hunted meat gather rate by +5% instead.

textiles-improved.name: 纺织品(已强化)
textiles-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' health by +50%.
If Textiles has already been researched, increase health by +100% instead.

tithe-barns-improved.name: 什一税仓库(已强化)
tithe-barns-improved.description:
Relics placed in a Prayer Tent provide an income of +60 Food, +60 Wood, and +15 Stone every minute.
If Tithe Barns has already been researched, increase the income of Food and Wood by +20 and Stone by +5 instead.

wheelbarrow-improved.name: 独轮推车(已强化)
wheelbarrow-improved.description:
Increase Villagers' resource carry capacity by +9 and movement speed by +15%.
If Wheelbarrow has already been researched, increase carry capacity by +4 instead.

whistling-arrows.name: 镝矢
whistling-arrows.description: Increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +5 seconds and range by +2 tiles.

whistling-arrows-improved.name: 镝矢(已强化)
whistling-arrows-improved.description:
Increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +7 seconds and range by +3 tiles.
If Whistling Arrows has already been researched, increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +2 seconds and range by +1 tile.

yam-network.name: 驿站网络
yam-network.description: Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.

yam-network-improved.name: 驿站网络(已强化)
yam-network-improved.description:
Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.
Improved Yam Network allows Traders to regenerate 1 health every 2 seconds while in Yam's aura.

bodkin-bolts.name: 锥状弩箭
bodkin-bolts.description: Gilded Crossbowmen deal +20 damage against Siege units.

golden-cuirass.name: 黄金胸甲
golden-cuirass.description: Gilded Men-at-Arms who fall below 30% health take -20% damage.

heavy-torches.name: 重型火炬
heavy-torches.description: Gilded Spearman torches deal area of effect damage.

scale-armor.name: 鳞甲
scale-armor.description: Increase the ranged armor of Gilded Archers by +3.

war-horses.name: 战马
war-horses.description: Gilded Knights take -25% damage while charging.

zornhau.name: 怒击
zornhau.description:
Gilded Landsknecht equip a halberd weapon that wounds enemies. When struck by this weapon, a unit will bleed for 2 damage every second. Lasts 10 seconds.
Any healing effect will remove the bleed.

advanced-academy.name: 高级学院
advanced-academy.description: Increases military production speed by +25% and outfits Military Schools with the ability to train Lancers and Janissaries.

anatolian-hills.name: 安纳托利亚山丘
anatolian-hills.description: Spawn 10 sheep at the Landmark Town Center and increase Villager mining speed by +15%.

field-work.name: 外勤任务
field-work.description: Spawn 2 Imams at the Landmark Town Center. Imams area heal nearby units for 1 health every second. Increases to 2 health in Castle Age and 3 health in Imperial Age.

great-bombard-emplacement.name: 大型手推炮炮台
great-bombard-emplacement.description: Add a defensive Great Bombard emplacement to this structure.

imperial-fleet.name: 帝国舰队
imperial-fleet.description: Increase the production speed of Gunpowder Ships by 25% and their movement speed by 25%.

janissary-company.name: 苏丹亲兵连队
janissary-company.description: Spawn 2 Janissaries for each of your Landmark Town Center and Military Schools at the Landmark Town Center.

mehter-drums.name: 奥斯曼军乐队战鼓
